quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Success is going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: If you want to improve, be content to be thought follish and stupid.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the hiuman freedoms - to choose one's attitude in any given set of circmstances, to choose one's own way.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Do what you must, let happen what may.
quotes.author: Pierre Hadot
quotes.source: The Inner Citadel: The Meditations of Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Life, properly regarded, is only a journey toward death
quotes.author: James Romm
